name: Bio-Droid: The Reckoning
description:
In this game you need keys to gain access to certain rooms. Those rooms also contain keys that will give you access to other rooms. This is how you will progress through the level. 

There are enemies; flying droids with a mounted chainsaw and unmanned turrets that fire electric energy rounds at you.

This project could potentially grow and have more content but that will depend on how it's received by the community and it's funding. 

If you would like to learn game development and how I made this game, please check my course: https://jeffersproductions.thinkific.com/

Tip: Run then crouch will perform a slide ;)
